original_title: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley
overview: With a magical new invention that promised to revolutionize blood testing, Elizabeth Holmes became the worldâ€™s youngest self-made billionaire, heralded as the next Steve Jobs. Then, overnight, her 10-billion-dollar company dissolved. The rise and fall of Theranos is a window into the psychology of fraud.
title: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley
